summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4837 for the improvement of the alley in block 74, Extension to Terry's 1st Addition, being the alley between 8th Avenue and 9th Avenue, from Seneca Street to Spring Street, by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 55711 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll , establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
